DOC.brief_summary: This study aims to investigate in adolescents and young adults: - the 24h diurnal variation of ambulatory central blood pressure - the association of central compared to peripheral blood pressure with indices of asymptomatic target-organ damage
DOC.brief_title: Central Blood Pressure in Adolescents and Young Adults
DOC.criteria: Adolescents and young adults (age range 1225 years) Subjects with any acute or significant chronic disease, with evidence of secondary hypertension, or on regular drug treatment will be excluded
